title: Python Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Python developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining backend services and APIs.
required_skills: Python, Flask, Django, SQL, REST APIs
responsibilities: Develop backend services; Write clean, maintainable code; Collaborate with frontend team; Optimize application performance

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to build machine learning models and analyze large datasets.
required_skills: Python, Machine Learning, Data Analysis, SQL, Pandas, NumPy
responsibilities: Build predictive models; Analyze data; Create visualizations; Present findings to stakeholders

title: Frontend Developer
description: We need a frontend developer to create beautiful, responsive user interfaces.
responsibilities: Develop user interfaces; Optimize for performance; Work with designers; Write tests

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Looking for a DevOps engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines.
responsibilities: Manage cloud infrastructure; Automate deployments; Monitor systems; Improve scalability

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Join our team as a full stack developer working on both frontend and backend.
responsibilities: Develop features end-to-end; Debug issues; Collaborate across teams; Write documentation
